representation_information.name: JPEG file with Exif metadata (common name).
representation_information.description: Employs baseline JPEG compression encoding (ISO/IEC 10918-1), which ensures that JPEG_EXIF files can be read by many image software applications. Exif's special contribution is metadata inserted as application marker segments (APP1 and APP2), representing a significant extension beyond JPEG's typical provision.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
